welcome.title: Set up your eWeLink account
welcome.text: Visit https://dev.ewelink.cc/ and log in/register to the eWelink developer account.

error.textEmpty: Error: the field cannot be empty
error.408: Error: AppId expired. Please contact eWelink support to renew it. After that, log in again.
error.general: Error: there is a problem authenticating your account. Please try again later.
error.unknown: Error: there is a problem with your eWelink developer account. Please contact eWelink support.

error.401: Cannot found access token info. Try to repair the device.
error.408: AppId expipred. Please contact ewelink support.
error.general: General error. Try to repair the device to solve.
error.offline: The device seems offline. Please check the power.
